Package gov.noaa.ngs.transform

Class OMTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.noaa.ngs.transform.CoordinateTransformation
      • gov.noaa.ngs.transform.OMTransformation
  • public class OMTransformation
extends CoordinateTransformation
    Transforms geodetic coordinates to spc and vice versa using Oblique Mercator projection
    Version:
    1.0 Date: 06/10/2011
    Author:
    Krishna Tadepalli
